title: Error running your tutorial on warping annotations together with images
body:
Hey, thank you for sharing this great codebase!
When I ran your small tutorial on warping annotations together with images, I got the following error: 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
TypeError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
[<ipython-input-10-02f1ac9ba918>](https://localhost:8080/#) in <module>()
      5 
      6 # warp image
----> 7 im_warped = vxm.layers.SpatialTransformer(add_identity=False)([im_keras, aff_keras])
      8 im_warped = im_warped[0, ..., 0]
      9 

3 frames
[/usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/keras/utils/generic_utils.py](https://localhost:8080/#) in validate_kwargs(kwargs, allowed_kwargs, error_message)
   1172   for kwarg in kwargs:
   1173     if kwarg not in allowed_kwargs:
-> 1174       raise TypeError(error_message, kwarg)
   1175 
   1176 

TypeError: ('Keyword argument not understood:', 'add_identity')
